name: U8g2 GLCD Emulator Client
description: The client library for the graphics lcd emulator/simulator project (https://github.com/ribasco/glcd-emulator). It wraps around the popular U8g2 graphics library. Communication between the client and emulator is established via Serial or TCP/IP
keywords: glcd, emulator, client, u8g2, arduino, oled, e-ink, lcd, virtual, simulation, monochrome, 8-bit
